Angiography.reconstruct¶

oct.Angiography.reconstruct(self, tomch1=None, tomch2=None, data=None, settings=None)¶

Reconstruct an angiography contrast frame

Notes: :param tomch1: Reconstructed tomogram from channel 1 :type tomch1: array :param tomch1: Reconstructed tomogram from channel 2 :type tomch1: array :param data: An object containing all the preloaded data from a directory for post processing :type data: object :param settings: The required/edittable settings to process an angio contrast frame :type settings: dict

Returns

A dictionary containing an angio and average intensity contrast frame labelled

’angio’ and ‘weight’, respectively

Return type

processeData (dict)
